price: (ښه) نو ولې د سرو زر و بنګړي نه ورباندې اچول كيږي يا ولې یو بل پسې پرېښتې نه دي ورسره راغلې؟
arabic: فَلَوۡلَآ أُلۡقِيَ عَلَيۡهِ أَسۡوِرَةٞ مِّن ذَهَبٍ أَوۡ جَآءَ مَعَهُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ مُقۡتَرِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: falawlā ul'qiya ʿalayhi aswiratun min dhahabin aw jāa maʿahu al-malāikatu muq'tarinīna
